feed.title: Improv Festivals
feed.subtitle: "Improv Festivals" is a site to list impro festivals all over the world.

entry.title: IFO Impro Fest
entry.content: The IFO Impro Fest ist one of Germany´s biggest international festival with workshop, shows, party and a lot of improv fun!
entry.summary: The IFO Impro Fest ist one of Germany´s biggest international festival with workshop, shows, party and a lot of improv fun!

entry.title: Birmingham Improv Festival 2024
entry.content: Birmingham’s Brilliant Biennial Improv Festival, bringing the best shows, teachers and improv fun to the UK’s Second City.
entry.summary: Birmingham’s Brilliant Biennial Improv Festival, bringing the best shows, teachers and improv fun to the UK’s Second City.

entry.title: Das Improv Festival
entry.content:
Berlin’s long-form improv festival! Featuring the best alternative improv from across Europe and North America, with an exciting slate of headline acts from around the world and top-notch workshops and intensives, plus all the best improv Berlin itself has to offer.

Sign up for our mailing list to get notified about Das news, including shows, ticket sales, workshops & more!
entry.summary: Berlin’s long-form improv festival! Featuring the best alternative improv from across Europe and North America, with an exciting slate of headline acts from around the world and top-notch workshops and intensives, plus all the best improv Berlin itself has to offer. Sign up for our mailing list to get notified about Das news, including shows, ticket sales, workshops & more!

entry.title: Improfestival Karlsruhe
entry.content:
After a smashing success in the last few years we are happy to be back in 2024 with even more shows and workshops.

This year we have a selection of:

  • 12 ensemble-members (10 actors, 1 musician and 1 technician)
  • A total of 9 days workshops, including one 3-day workshop with a showcase
  • And 18 completely different shows over 6 nights of performances

We are very excited to have a put together a program of very different improvised styles that are represented in unique shows and workshops but at the same time to keep the spirit of a “cozy festival for friends”.

We are looking forward to having you back or welcoming you for a first time in Karlsruhe!

Follow us, get more info or book your tickets:

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • About the ensemble
  • Book your shows
  • Book your workshops
entry.summary: After a smashing success in the last few years we are happy to be back in 2024 with even more shows and workshops. This year we have a selection of: 12 ensemble-members (10 actors, 1 musician and 1 technician) A total of 9 days workshops, including one 3-day workshop with a showcase And 18 completely different shows over 6 nights of performances We are very excited to have a put together a program of very different improvised styles that are represented in unique shows and workshops but at the same time to keep the spirit of a “cozy festival for friends”. We are looking forward to having you back or welcoming you for a first time in Karlsruhe! entry.title: IRREVERENTE - International Impro Festival of Lisbon

link.title: IRREVERENTE - International Impro Festival of Lisbon

entry.content: The Festival intends to bring together the impro community living in Portugal with other countries, by promoting an event with activities in Theater, Dance, Music and other forms of art. In 2024 we introduce our Experimental Edition with the Theme: Impro and…
entry.summary: The Festival intends to bring together the impro community living in Portugal with other countries, by promoting an event with activities in Theater, Dance, Music and other forms of art. In 2024 we introduce our Experimental Edition with the Theme: Impro and…

entry.title: The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival

link.title: The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival

entry.content:
Welcome to the second edition of The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival! Join us for 4 jam-packed days of musical workshops, shows, and improv fun in beautiful Barcelona, Spain. The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival brings together amateur and professional improvisers and musicians to teach, share, learn, celebrate, and enjoy the hilarious and magical art of musical improv

Applications to perform with your group open February 1st-21st Workshop info & ticket sales to follow.

All details and updates will be posted at www.thebigsing.es
entry.summary: Welcome to the second edition of The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival! Join us for 4 jam-packed days of musical workshops, shows, and improv fun in beautiful Barcelona, Spain. The Big Sing Musical Improv Festival brings together amateur and professional improvisers and musicians to teach, share, learn, celebrate, and enjoy the hilarious and magical art of musical improv Applications to perform with your group open February 1st-21st Workshop info & ticket sales to follow. All details and updates will be posted at www.thebigsing.es

entry.title: Flock Festival
entry.content:
The international festival of Flock Theatre comes back with seven crazy days of improvised theatre, workshops, shows and more!

Stay tuned for more information on the line-up of fabulous international teachers and performers soon!
entry.summary: The international festival of Flock Theatre comes back with seven crazy days of improvised theatre, workshops, shows and more! Stay tuned for more information on the line-up of fabulous international teachers and performers soon!

entry.title: Close Encounters Improv Festival
entry.content: We are thrilled to be planning this festival that we hope will happen every year from 2024-infinity! The purpose of the festival is to celebrate improv and artists and to unite artists from all over Switzerland and eventually the world! We also want to have a lot of fun and parties! :) The theme will be 80’s inspired and our first festival is entitled BACK to the FUTURE! Stay tuned! https://www.closeencounterstheatre.com/festival-june-2024
entry.summary: We are thrilled to be planning this festival that we hope will happen every year from 2024-infinity! The purpose of the festival is to celebrate improv and artists and to unite artists from all over Switzerland and eventually the world! We also want to have a lot of fun and parties! :) The theme will be 80’s inspired and our first festival is entitled BACK to the FUTURE! Stay tuned! https://www.closeencounterstheatre.com/festival-june-2024

entry.title: Liverpool Improvisation Festival
entry.content: ​Liverpool Improvisation Festival encourages innovation, risk taking and are inspired by those that do. The festival aims to create opportunity for those who create and teach improvised live performance at whatever stage of their career and across multiple art forms. In doing so we aim to educate, inspire and develop future audiences and performers of improvisation.
entry.summary: ​Liverpool Improvisation Festival encourages innovation, risk taking and are inspired by those that do. The festival aims to create opportunity for those who create and teach improvised live performance at whatever stage of their career and across multiple art forms. In doing so we aim to educate, inspire and develop future audiences and performers of improvisation.
